data.name: EIBlock1Link
data.value: Read more

data.name: EIBlock1Text
data.value: Become fluent in any language with online language exchanges. Go to Langademy´s chat rooms, find native speakers and practice your favourite languages. You can learn spanish, german, english, french or any other language!

data.name: EIBlock1Title
data.value: Conversation exchange

data.name: EIBlock2B1Text
data.value: What languages do you speak? Which is your level? Wheare are your from? What are your interests? Upload your avatar and cover photos and be ready to talk in english, spanish or the language you want

data.name: EIBlock2B1Title
data.value: Sign up and start learning languages for free

data.name: EIBlock2B2Text
data.value: The easiest way to meet a new partner. Plug in your webcam and your microphone and enter the room of the language you want to practice. You can chat or make private videocalls with the natives you meet in the chat rooms. Be kind ;-)

data.name: EIBlock2B2Title
data.value: Try conversation exchange in the chat rooms

data.name: EIBlock2B3Text
data.value: Vote him in his profile! Send him a contact request. When he accepts it you will be able to chat in private an make video calls without entering the language rooms

data.name: EIBlock2B3Title
data.value: Did you like chatting with your partner?

data.name: EIBlock3B1Text1
data.value: The amount of time you have for speaking with natives by videconference is the same amount of time that you use for helping others speak in your antive language

data.name: EIBlock3B1Text2
data.value: It works like a tandem but you decide who your partners are, when and in which language you want to chat with

data.name: EIBlock3B1Text3
data.value: Check your time balance to know if you need to increase it speaking in your antive language. Read the time banking rules in order to know when a videochat conversation will add or substract time from your Time Bank account. Using your state, your contacts will know if you are available to start a video call

data.name: EIBlock3B1Title
data.value: Time banking

data.name: EIMBPictureAlt
data.value: Create conversation exchange meetups in the meetup board

data.name: EIMeetingBoard1
data.value: Schedule conversation exchanges with Langademy's Meetup Board

data.name: EIMeetingBoard3
data.value: When do you want to have a conversation? Contribute to enriching the language exchange community by scheduling meetups for the days and hours you want to enter a chat room. Make it in time so people will have time to join the meetup

data.name: EIMeetingBoard4
data.value: If someone else has organized a meetup, you can join the meetup. It's just a click! If you join the meetup you can chose and vote the trending topics to be discussed at the meetup.

data.name: EIMeetingBoard5
data.value: You can also share the meetup link in social networks so more people can join the meetup. The more, the merrier :-)

data.name: EINextMeetups
data.value: Next meetups to practice languages

data.name: EIParticipants
data.value: Participants

data.name: EISearchPartners
data.value: Search language exchange partners

data.name: EITitle
data.value: Your online language exchange community
